title: Rendering issues - blank world and missing properties (followup from kforge)

content.raw:
I'm following up with the ticket at https://kforge.ros.org/gazebo/trac/ticket/63 

I've upgraded to gazebo-1.2.5, and I'm still seeing similar issues.  The clouds and background render, but there's no ground plane.  And when I insert models, none of them seem to have textures.  I've attached a screenshot of empty.world to give you an idea.

I'm running Fedora 17 x86_64.  The package versions on my system are:

gazebo-1.2.5-1.fc17.x86_64

ogre-1.7.3-7.fc17.x86_64

qt-4.8.2-7.fc17.x86_64

bullet-2.81-1.fc17.x86_64

cegui-0.7.6-4.fc17.x86_64

tbb-4.0-2.20110809.fc17.x86_64

freeimage-3.10.0-9.fc17.x86_64

xorg-x11-drv-nvidia-304.51-1.fc17.x86_64

libccd-1.4-1.fc17.x86_64

cegui.log and ogre.log in ~/.gazebo don't contain any errors, I'll post ogre.log anyway.  I'll also attached the output of glxinfo.

I'm following up with the ticket at https://kforge.ros.org/gazebo/trac/ticket/63

I've upgraded to gazebo-1.2.5, and I'm still seeing similar issues. The clouds and background render, but there's no ground plane. And when I insert models, none of them seem to have textures. I've attached a screenshot of empty.world to give you an idea.

I'm running Fedora 17 x86_64. The package versions on my system are:

cegui.log and ogre.log in ~/.gazebo don't contain any errors, I'll post ogre.log anyway. I'll also attached the output of glxinfo.
